faculty.course_name: Department of Korean Language and Literature
faculty.description:
Educating elites who inquire into the nature of humans as social beings and lead the achievement of social justice.

Highlights:

  • Provides a focused academic atmosphere for students.
  • The College of Humanities & Social Sciences offers various programs which explore the nature of humans as social beings and the educational goal of the college is to educate liberal professionals and leaders with civic virtues of social vision and creative integrity who will contribute to the development of our society.
